title: #244 - Ethics of Giving to the Needy
itunes:title: #244 - Ethics of Giving to the Needy
description: Tis the season mother f-er's! That means it's time to talk about giving to charity and whether or not it's a good thing. Peter Singer and Larry Temkin stand in opposition (sort of) when it comes to how we should be doling out charitable efforts. Also, some kid keeps falling in a damn pond. Enjoy this holiday episode ya filthy animals!
